DOC.brief_title: Changes Invitro ex Vivo Lens Metrology With Daily Wear Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate change invitro ex vivo contact lens geometry daily lens wear
DOC.criteria: • Able read comprehend English give informed consent demonstrate signing record inform consent ; Be least 18 year old ; Willing comply wear clinical trial visit schedule direct investigator ; Have ocular health finding consider `` normal '' would prevent participant safely wear contact lens ; Has vision correctable least 6/12 ( 20/40 ) good distance eye contact lenses ; Be experience wear contact lens . • Any preexist ocular irritation , injury condition ( include keratoconus herpes keratitis ) cornea , conjunctiva eyelid would preclude contact lens fit safe wear contact lens ; Any systemic disease adversely affect ocular health An active corneal infection active ocular disease would affect wear contact lens ; Use topical ocular medication trial exception saline drop ; Use need systemic medication topical medication may alter normal ocular findings/are know affect participant 's ocular health/physiology contact lens performance Eye surgery within 12 week immediately prior enrolment trial ; Previous corneal refractive surgery ; Contraindications contact lens wear ; Participated currently enrol another clinical trial may affect vision ocular physiology within previous 2 week ; Be pregnant ( formal test pregnancy require . A participant 's verbal report sufficient ) ; Worn soft contact lenses 2 calendar day rigid gas permeable/ orthokeratology lenses 7 calendar day prior .
